<FONT color='#FFD400'>Power Strike Focus</FONT>\nUse melee skills like Hammer Blow to regain spirit and Power Strike to dish out damage.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Snail Toss Focus</FONT>\nThrow snails to attack from a distance and use Second Wind to restore spirit.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Bullet & Missile Focus</FONT>\nApply pressure with low-cost bullet skills and deal burst damage with missile attacks.

<FONT color='#FFD400'>Attack Focus</FONT>\nThis focus has a short attack range and limited options against groups, but is capable of dealing numerous strikes in quick succession, resulting in high damage. Stinging Flurry and Divine Strike will be your most powerful weapons.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Attack/Support Focus</FONT>\nUse Typhoon Slash to damage enemies over a large range. Reduce the enemy's defense with Shield Toss, granting your party members the advantage.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Support Focus</FONT>\nAt the expense of attack power comes numerous defense skills to protect your allies. Warhorn and Shield Toss gives your entire party the edge in combat.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Death Spin Focus</FONT>\nUse Death Spin to deal damage on the move, striking enemies over a large range. Dish out more immediate damage with Ground Breaker.

<FONT color='#FFD400'>Void Slash Focus</FONT>\nUse Void Slash to dish out constant damage while avoiding being knocked back by enemy attacks. Extremely efficient against enemies that aren't very mobile.

<FONT color='#FFD400'>Adrenaline Focus (Advanced)</FONT>\nIncrease your combat ability when your health gets low. Leverage Blood Price and Adrenaline Rush to allow skill use without fear of running out of spirit.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Fire & Ice Focus</FONT>\nUse Ice Spear as your primary attack. When fighting mobile enemies, use Flame Wave to deal burning damage over time.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Multi-Elemental Focus</FONT>\nUse all three elements and a variety of skills.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Lightning Focus</FONT>\nWhile not as damaging as other focuses, you can use Focus Seal to strengthen your allies while shocking enemies with electric magic.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Burst Damage Focus</FONT>\nThis focus specializes in high-power attack skills such as Holy Blast. While its range is short, its damage output is tremendous.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Healing Focus</FONT>\nSupport allies with powerful healing abilities and use Scourging Wave to inflict consistent damage from a distance.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Buff Focus</FONT>\nUse Holy Symbol and Celestial Blessings to empower allies. You can provide healing in addition to helping out in battle.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Ranged Focus</FONT>\nDeal continuous damage from a distance. This focus performs best at a distance of 4 m from the enemy.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Melee Focus</FONT>\nFreeze targets with Ice Arrow and use Bow Swing to damage opponents.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Passive Support Focus</FONT>\nWhile this focus uses fewer attack skills, it harnesses passive and buff skills to deal damage.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Bullet & Missile Focus</FONT>\nCombine low-cost bullet skills with powerful missile skills to output serious damage.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Bullet & Electromagnetic Focus</FONT>\nInflict damage in powerful bursts with Electric Blast and Magnetic Bomb, rather than slowly and steadily with bullet skills.

<FONT color='#FFD400'>Support Focus</FONT>\nUse grenades to stun enemies and med kits to heal allies. Rely on the Electric Blast skill from the Blast Charge Kit to deal continuous damage without the use of bullet skills.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Toxin Focus</FONT>\nUtilize various toxic skills to deal damage over time and uses Surprise Attack to detonate those toxins.

<FONT color='#FFD400'>Assault Focus</FONT>\nUse Blade Dance to unleash powerful strikes against multiple enemies. Avoid critical attacks from enemies with the enhanced Blade Dance, and activate Retaliation to empower your attacks.

<FONT color='#FFD400'>Haste Focus (Advanced)</FONT>\nCareful management is required to maintain your Haste status, increasing damage alongside movement speed. The focus's martial-arts-based skills have difficulty striking multiple opponents, but do very high damage.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Throwing Focus</FONT>\nThrow a large number of weapons without the need to rest. Incredibly effective against small groups of enemies.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Shadow Focus</FONT>\nSpecialize in dark elemental skills such as Shadow Cutter and Shadow Burst.

<FONT color='#FFD400'>Mark of Death Focus</FONT>\nWhile less powerful in traditional combat than other focuses, your Mark of Death and Death Sentence skills brand your opponents with shadow marks which increase the effectiveness of your party's attacks.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Flame Focus</FONT>\nJump into battle with attacks empowered by Flame Sigil. Set enemies ablaze with Whirling Blades, then strike them down with melee skills.

<FONT color='#FFD400'>Frost Focus (Best for Level 22+)</FONT>\nControl your foes with abilities attuned to your Frost Sigil. Extremely efficient when dealing with multiple enemies due to increased attack range.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Storm Focus (Best for Level 22+)</FONT>\nHarness the power of your Storm Sigil. Your attacks are swifter and more deadly than other focuses, but are more difficult to control.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Punch Combo Focus</FONT>\nUse punch-based skills like Rocket Punch, Fists of Fury, and Beatdown to continuously deal out high damage.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Kick Combo Focus</FONT>\nSpecialize in kick-based skills like Missile Knuckle, Rising Kick, and Guillotine, dealing huge damage to opponents.

<FONT color='#FFD400'>Expert (Best for Level 65+)</FONT>\nSwitch between punch and kick skills to bypass cooldowns and inflict serious pain. While this focus is capable of combo-based combat, a large number of skill points are required to be effective.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Burst Damage Focus</FONT>\nThis focus specializes in high-power attacks such as Radiant Salvo, a skill capable of turning entire battles around.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Healing Focus</FONT>\nSupport allies with powerful healing abilities. Utilize Split Barrier and Fount of Renewal to increase their survivability.
<FONT color='#FFD400'>Stun & Debuff Focus</FONT>\nUse accuracy, evasion, and defense-reducing debuffs to aid allies in battle.

<FONT color='#C0C0C0' size='15' >Land Contract Agreement</FONT>

1) Signing a land contract links the address for that plot of land to your home.
- If the contract is allowed to expire, your ownership will be revoked. Any objects placed outdoors will be returned to you automatically.
- You can extend the contract at any time before it expires.

2) Until the time of the contract's expiration, Golden Estates Realty guarantees the exclusive use of the plot for all characters on the player account.
- There is no guarantee of access to the property in the case of maintenance or login difficulties, therefore it is up to the player to renew their contract punctually.
- Breaking the contract or allowing it to expire voids your claim on the property, and no new contract may be issued for a period of 72 hours.

3) You may break the contract at any time, however contract and extension fees are not refundable.

4) Real estate contract periods and fees vary based on the market value of the property in question. The contract period and fee may be changed at the discretion of Golden Estates Realty.
- Additional contract extensions after the initial expiration cannot be guaranteed. If the real estate in question is subject to redevelopment, the contract cannot be extended.

5) You may freely utilize UGC within the contracted land or the home that occupies it.
- You hereby agree that such UGC may be displayed or reproduced by anyone, including outside the game client. These assets may be copied or saved by others through screenshots or other media.
- Users may not create or display UGC that violates the rights of other users (copyright, trademark, rights of publicity, intellectual property, personal privacy rights, etc.), and the intellectual property rights, including copyright, of such UGC content created or displayed by users belongs to MapleStory 2 in accordance with the User Generated Content Policy found here: https://support.nexon.net/hc/en-us/articles/206109896-User-Generated-Content. Content that violates such rights may be deleted or hidden at Nexon's discretion.
- Users may not create, share or display UGC which violates the User Generated Content Policy or Terms of Service (“ToS”) found here: https://support.nexon.net/hc/en-us/sections/201384856-Nexon-America-Legal-Policies, such as content that includes obscenities, hate speech, slander, political opinions, etc.
Any game currency (Merets) that have changed hands in relation to UGC in violation of the ToS will not be refunded.
- Nexon reserves the right to ban or restrict the access of users who create, share or display UGC that violates the ToS or Nexon’s User Generated Content Policy. In these cases, MapleStory 2 cannot guarantee the contracts of offending users, and may cancel said contracts at any time.

<FONT color='#C0C0C0' size='15' >Black Market Operations Notice</FONT>

1) Item Trades
- Items listed for sale will appear on the sales log for {5} days.
- Mesos listed on the Black Market can be purchased with merets (except event merets). When the mesos sell, the payout will be provided in the form of event merets.
- If the sale is canceled or expires, the mesos will be returned to you via mail.
- When your mesos are purchased, {6} of the sale price will be deducted as a sales fee during payout calculation.
- When listing mesos for sale, the price must be within {7}% of the average trade price.
- You may list mesos on the Black Market at most {8} times per day per account, and purchase mesos up to {9} times per day per account. This limit resets daily at midnight.

2) Item Trades - After listing the item to be sold, it will appear on the sales log for {0} day(s).
- When listing an item, {1}% of the sale price (max {2} mesos) will be taken as a deposit. The deposit will be returned by mail when the sale is completed, or alongside the item when the listing expires. However, the deposit will not be returned if you cancel the sale yourself.
- When the sale is canceled or expires, the listed items will be returned to you by mail.
- When your item sells, {3} of the sale price will be deducted as a sales fee during payout calculation.

3) General Notice
- Items and mesos sent by mail as the result of a completed sale, expired listing, or canceled listing will be deleted from your mailbox if not claimed within {4} days, the standard expiration period for stored mail..
- In the event that a problem occurs with the trade, the payout may be restored.

<FONT color='#C0C0C0' size='15' >Black Market Operations Notice</FONT>

1) Item Trades
- Items listed for sale will appear on the sales log for {5} days.

- If the sale is canceled or expires, the mesos will be returned to you via mail.
- When listing mesos for sale, the price must be within {7}% of the average trade price.
- You may list mesos on the Black Market up to {8} times per day per account. This limit resets daily at midnight.
- You may purchase mesos on the Black Market up to {9} times per month per account. This limit resets on the 1st of every month at midnight.

2) Item Trades - After listing the item to be sold, it will appear on the sales log for {0} day(s).
- When listing an item, {1}% of the sale price (max {2} mesos) will be taken as a deposit. The deposit will be returned by mail when the sale is completed, or alongside the item when the listing expires. However, the deposit will not be returned if you cancel the sale yourself.
- When the sale is canceled or expires, the listed items will be returned to you by mail.
- When your item sells, {3} of the sale price will be deducted as a sales fee during payout calculation.

3) General Notice
- Items and mesos sent by mail as the result of a completed sale, expired listing, or canceled listing will be deleted from your mailbox if not claimed within {4} days, the standard expiration period for stored mail..
- In the event that a problem occurs with the trade, the payout may be restored.

<FONT color='#C0C0C0' size='15' >UGC Content User Rules and Legal Notice </FONT>

Users can create and publish UGC (User Generated Content) within the service provided by MapleStory 2.
However, UGC must be created while adhering to the operating policy. Upon violation, the UGC can be edited, deleted, or taken down without any warning.

1) Users can freely create/publish UGC within the game.
The applicable template and content belong to the user who created them. However, the intellectual property rights and copyright in regards to the pattern item, the pattern item with the template applied, and the music scores belong to MapleStory 2. (This does not apply if the applicable template and content infringe on the rights of a third party). MapleStory 2 has the right to reuse, disclose, and send the pattern item, the pattern item with the template applied, and the music scores.

2) The UGC published by the user can be displayed to anyone inside or outside of the game, and can be copied and saved as screenshots by other people as well.

3) To use UGC properly, please comply with the rules shown below.
- Users cannot create UGC that infringes on the rights of other parties (rights which include but are not limited to copyright, trademark, portrait, intellectual property, personal information and privacy). MapleStory 2 reserves the right to delete or hide any UGC it deems as an infringement on such rights.
- Users cannot create/publish/use any UGC that displays obscenity, hatred, slander, radical political leanings, etc. which violate the operating policy. MapleStory 2 reserves the right to delete or hide anything that is deemed as a violation of the operating policy. 
- Upon the editing, deletion, or take down of UGC due to a violation of the policy, the game currency used (Meso, Meret, etc) will not be returned.

4) MapleStory 2 reserves the right to restrict the game's services to users who produce, post, or use UGC that violates the operating policy.

5) Users can earn up to 100,000 Merets in one month from the Design Shop.
-To provide opportunities for more users, the amount you earn per month is restricted per account.

*MapleStory 2 is working to prevent the infringement of the rights of all users. Upon an infringement of rights, please contact us through the Copyright Infringement Notification Center.

<FONT color='#C0C0C0' size='15' >Black Market Operations Notice</FONT>

1) Item Trades
- Items listed for sale will appear on the sales log for {0} days.
- Listing an item requires a deposit of {1}% of the item price (up to {2} mesos). The deposit will be returned by mail upon the sale of the item or the expiration of its listing. The deposit will not be returned if you cancel the sale at any time.
- When the sale is canceled, or the listing expires, the item will be returned to you by the mail.
- When the item sells, {3}% of the sale price will be deducted as a sales fee.

2) Meso Trades
- After listing mesos for sale, they will appear on the sales log for {5} days.
- The mesos listed on the Black Market can be purchased with merets (except event merets). When your mesos are purchased, your payout will be in event merets.
- If the sale is canceled or expires, the mesos will be returned to you by mail.
- When your mesos are purchased, {6}% of the sale price will be deducted as a sales fee during the calculation of the payout.
- When listing mesos for sale, the price must be within {7}% of the average trade price.
- You may list mesos on the Black Market at most {8} times per day per account, and purchase mesos up to {9} times per day per account. This limit resets daily at midnight.

3) General Notice
- Items and mesos sent by mail as the result of a completed sale, expired listing, or canceled listing will be deleted from your mailbox if not claimed within {4} days, the standard expiration period for stored mail.
- If a problem occurs with the trade, the payout may be restored.

<FONT color='#C0C0C0' size='15' >UGC Content User Rules and Legal Notice </FONT>

Users can create and publish UGC (User Generated Content) within the service provided by MapleStory 2.

1) Users can freely create/publish UGC within the game.

However, the intellectual property rights and copyright in regards to the pattern item, the pattern item with the template applied, and the music scores belong to MapleStory 2. (This does not apply if the applicable template and content infringe on the rights of a third party). 2) The UGC published by the user can be displayed to anyone inside or outside of the game, and can be copied and saved as screenshots by other people as well.

3) To use UGC properly, please comply with the rules shown below.
- Users cannot create UGC that infringes on the rights of other parties (rights which include but are not limited to copyright, trademark, rights of publicity, intellectual property, personal information and privacy). Legal liability that arises from getting reported for infringement of rights will be the user's sole responsibility. MapleStory 2 reserves the right to delete or hide any UGC it deems an infringement on such rights for any other reason or no reason.

MapleStory 2 reserves the right to delete or hide anything that is deemed as a violation of NEXON's policies.

4) NEXON reserves the right to restrict users who produce, post, or use UGC that violates the operating policy from accessing the game’s services.
